entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain or periods of snow changing to flurries after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
